topic.title: Cognitive Status Problem Observation - conformance rules

section.p:
A cognitive status problem observation is a clinical statement that describes a patient's cognitive condition, findings, or symptoms. Examples of cognitive problem observations are inability to recall, amnesia, dementia, and aggressive behavior.
A cognitive problem observation is a finding or medical condition. This is different from a cognitive result observation, which is a response to a question that provides insight into the patient's cognitive status, judgement, comprehension ability, or response speed.
THIS TEMPLATE HAS BEEN DEPRECATED AND MAY BE DELETED FROM A FUTURE RELEASE OF THIS IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE. USE OF THIS TEMPLATE IS NOT RECOMMENDED.
Reason for deprecation: Cognitive Status Problem Observation has been merged, without loss of expressivity, into Mental Status Observation (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74:2014-06-09).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14346, CONF:14347 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.73"
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14320)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:14344)
Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the problem was not observed.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14321)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14804)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14805)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14341)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14323)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14324)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:14693)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:14349)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14331, CONF:14588, CONF:14351)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14335, CONF:14589, CONF:14352)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14467, CONF:14590, CONF:14468)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:14342)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:14343)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14325)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:14326)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:14327)
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14320)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:14344)
Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the problem was not observed.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14321)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14804)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14805)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14341)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14323)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14324)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:14349)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:14693)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Age At Onset) such that it (CONF:9059, CONF:9060, CONF:15590, R2.1=CONF:1198-9059, R2.1=CONF:1198-9060, R2.1=CONF:1198-15590)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Problem Status) such that it (CONF:9063, CONF:9068, CONF:15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Health Status) such that it (CONF:9067, CONF:9064, CONF:15592)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14331, CONF:14588, CONF:14351)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14335, CONF:14589, CONF:14352)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14467, CONF:14590, CONF:14468)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15587)
reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:15588)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15589)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:15604)
value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10141)

If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:10142)
entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9069, R2.1=CONF:9069)
value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:16749, R2.1=CONF:1198-16749)
translation, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @code (CodeSystem: ICD10CM 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 STATIC) (CONF:16750, R2.1=CONF:1198-16750)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:14342)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:14343)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14325)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:14326)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:14327)

<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1149545059"/> <code code="373930000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Cognitive function finding"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="660622350"/> <methodCode code="480876447"/> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1714332511"/> <code code="1007690936"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> </supply> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2108632340"/> <code code="1916619222"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="2033329504"/> <methodCode code="26454135"/> <participant typeCode="IND"> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole classCode="CAREGIVER"/> </participant> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1908974446"/> <code code="591466568"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <methodCode code="255566860"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1267961358"/> <code code="2078268601"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <methodCode code="1635181118"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
